mapper.select: select * from Energy where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Energy where name="单台水")) )
select * from Energy where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Energy where name="单台电")) )
select * from Energy where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from Energy where name="单台气")) )
select * from Energy where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="单台水")
select * from Energy where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="单台电")
select * from Energy where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="单台气")
mapper.insert: insert into Energy( name, standardsWater, water, standardsElectricity, electricity, standardsGas, gas)
mapper.update: update Energy set(name=#{name}, standardsWater=#{standardsWater}, water, standardsElectricity, electricity, standardsGas, gas) where (id=#{id})
